sentences.en: A shuttle bus runs frequently between the Inn and the Country Club.
sentences.cn: 一辆区间公交车频繁地往返于这家旅馆和那个乡村俱乐部。

sentences.en: Basic food products are frequently unavailable in the state shops.
sentences.cn: 在国营商店里经常连一些基本食品都买不到。

sentences.en: Dry hair can be damaged by washing it too frequently.
sentences.cn: 干性头发洗得太频繁容易受损。

sentences.en: Frequently he was called upon to resolve conflicts.
sentences.cn: 不断有人要求他出面解决冲突。

sentences.en: Frequently sufferers of this kind of allergy are also sufferers of asthma.
sentences.cn: 患有这种过敏症的人也经常会患有哮喘病。

sentences.en: Her advice has frequently been less than wholly helpful.
sentences.cn: 她的建议往往毫无帮助。

sentences.en: I frequently paint between 10 and 20 insets for my murals.
sentences.cn: 我经常会为我的壁画画上10到20个嵌套图画。

sentences.en: Iron and folic acid supplements are frequently given to pregnant women.
sentences.cn: 铁剂和叶酸片常被配给孕妇服用。

sentences.en: It frequently appears that Bell mistrusts all journalists.
sentences.cn: 似乎贝尔常常对所有新闻记者都持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: Lean hard-training women athletes may men-struate less frequently or not at all.
sentences.cn: 身材瘦削而且训练艰苦的女运动员行经可能不那么频繁，或者根本不来月经。

sentences.en: More and more frequently the vessel lurched into a sudden roll.
sentences.cn: 船不时会猛烈摇晃一下，而且越来越频繁。

sentences.en: The reality of mothering is frequently very different from the romantic ideal.
sentences.cn: 养育孩子的现实经常与浪漫的理想大相径庭。

sentences.en: Their work is frequently an obsession that overrides all other considerations.
sentences.cn: 他们对工作的痴迷常常超乎其他一切。

sentences.en: They frequently plumb the depths of loneliness, humiliation and despair.
sentences.cn: 他们常常陷入孤独、屈辱和绝望的深渊。

sentences.en: Women are frequently underpaid for the work that they do.
sentences.cn: 女性工作所得的报酬常常偏低。

words.tran_cn: 频繁的；时常发生的；惯常的
频繁地，经常地；时常，屡次
